text.div:
CH_EMED

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://fhir.ch/ig/ch-emed/ImplementationGuide/ch.fhir.ig.ch-emed

resource.description: EDQM - Standard Terms used in Swizerland (aggregations of codes of ValueSets RouteOfAdmministartion, Dose Form, see original codes system defined in https://standardterms.edqm.eu/#)

resource.name: CH EMED Extension Document Author
resource.description: Extension to represent the author of the original document in the medication statement (for the Medication Card document)

resource.description: Extension to reference the medication dispense

resource.description: Extension to represent the dosage type using a template ID as used in a CDA document

resource.description: Extension to represent the reference to the Pharmaceutical Advice document

resource.description: Extension to represent the reference to the Medication Prescritpion document

resource.name: CH EMED Extension Represented Organization
resource.description: Extension to represent the organization of the author

resource.name: CH EMED Extension Substitution
resource.description: Extension to represent the substitution of a medication

resource.name: CH EMED Extension Treatment Plan
resource.description: Extension to represent the reference to the Medication Treatment Plan document

resource.name: CH EMED Extension Treatment Reason
resource.description: Extension to represent the treatment reason
